de.engehausen.treemap
Interface ITreeModel<N>

Type Parameters:
N - the type of node returned by model.
All Known Subinterfaces:
IWeightedTreeModel<N>
All Known Implementing Classes:
FileModel, GenericTreeModel, RectangleModelImpl
public interface ITreeModel<N>

A tree model.

Method Summary
 java.util.Iterator<N> getChildren(N node)
          Returns an iterator for the children of the given node.
 N getParent(N node)
          Returns the parent node for the given node.
 N getRoot()
          Returns the root node of the model.
 boolean hasChildren(N node)
          Indicates whether the passed in node has children or not.
 

Method Detail

getRoot

N getRoot()
Returns the root node of the model.

Returns:
the root node; may be null if the model is empty.

getParent

N getParent(N node)
Returns the parent node for the given node.

Parameters:
node - a node for which to return the parent; must not be null
Returns:
the parent node, or null if node is the root node.

getChildren

java.util.Iterator<N> getChildren(N node)
Returns an iterator for the children of the given node.

Parameters:
node - the node for which to return children.
Returns:
an iterator over the children; may be empty, but never null.

hasChildren

boolean hasChildren(N node)
Indicates whether the passed in node has children or not.

Parameters:
node - the node for which to indicate whether there are children or not.
Returns:
false if there are no children; please note that returning true always is a valid implementation.
